Name: Dear Friend
About the game: Join us on this psychological and spiritual adventure in which you will have a very special friend who will guide you to successfully face your greatest challenges. Immerse yourself in this journey and discover the deepest mysteries of your character's life, make the right choices and solve the puzzles on your way to reach your final destination. Dear Friend is an immersive experience that not only brings gameplay with moments of entertainment, but puts you at the center of existential dilemmas so common in anyone's life. More than a game, a transcendental experience. Our greatest and true adventures are internal. It's not easy to admit that we have problems, it takes courage and willpower. And without hope, each road seems longer than it really is. What we have to understand is that we are not alone. In the end, the journey is much more beautiful and shorter than we imagined. You just have to believe it. That's what Dear Friend is about, a psychological and spiritual adventure in which you, as a character, will have a very special friend, who will guide you to face your biggest inner challenges. It will be up to you to find out who this friend is. Immerse yourself in this journey and discover the deepest mysteries of your character's life, make the right choices and solve the challenges on your way, to reach your destination. And who knows, at the end of this story, you'll see life in a new light. Dear Friend is an immersive experience that not only brings gameplay with moments of entertainment, but puts you at the center of existential dilemmas so common in anyone's life.
